## some() function

Similar to `every()` reducer, but only requires at least 1 value to succeed predicate test (and then immediately terminates with `true` as result).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function some<T>(pred?: Predicate<T>): Reducer<boolean, T>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pred | <code>Predicate&lt;T&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Reducer<boolean, T>`
